attributes.action: look at the inclusion policy's with education authority's and schools regarding segragation of disabled children to enable them to play with their peers at all break times
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we would like the goverment to change the policy of inclusion regarding disabled childrens rights,to play with all able children at break times without been segragated away from their peers, to give them the right and freedom like anyother child to feel included,respected,in all outdoor break times
